pr_title: Rework of All Ids Table for External Query

timeline.message: try and refactor ALL_IDS_TABLE into less unreliable with regards to re-imports
Manual reimplementation towards ALL_ID_TABLE: This has the same behaviour as what's currently happening except that we can now control it completely.
Remove as many references to ALL_IDS_TABLE as possible
Refactor nextTable towards taking a tableId instead of a Table
Fix a bug over equality with change to TableId
Change ConceptQueryPlan to always run a single pass with ConqueryConstants.ALL_IDS_TABLE and refactor ExternalNode
Fix counting of Imports in DeletionTests
Add Dataset.isAllIdsTable and make requiredTables ThreadLocal to avoid locking

timeline.bodyText: Ich glaube dieser Log braucht jetzt keinen ProgressReport mehr :D
